section.title: Summary of Changes in the Delegation Service
section.para: The following changes have occurred for Delegation Service since the last stable release, previousversion:

listitem.para: Underlying Java WS Authentication library supports RFC 3820 proxies by default as described . Delegation Service will also default to RFC 3820 proxies.

listitem.simpara: Added support for GetResourceProperties and QueryResourceProperties interface. This allows for client to query for the lifetime of the delegated credential.

listitem.para: The command line client options have been changed to use options that are standard across the toolkit. Note that all features that were supported before are still supported, but some of the option names have changed.
